name: Toro Cantina
description: A vibrant spot for authentic tacos and Mexican fare, known for its creative menu and lively atmosphere. Perfect for taco enthusiasts with a modern twist.

name: Sheba Al-Yemen
description: A beloved spot offering traditional Ethiopian and Yemeni dishes, with rich flavors and communal dining experiences. A hidden gem for diverse cuisine lovers.

name: Villa Di Valletta
description: An upscale dining experience focusing on fresh seafood and Italian classics. A long-standing favorite in the Capital Region for special occasions.

name: Sukhothai
description: A cozy spot on Lark Street offering authentic Thai dishes with bold flavors. Known for its curries, pad thai, and vegetarian options.

name: Berben and Wolff's
description: A popular vegan deli offering plant-based comfort food, including sandwiches and baked goods. A must-try for vegan diners in the Capital Region.

name: El Mariachi Mexican Restaurant
description: A long-established spot for traditional Mexican cuisine, specializing in tacos and hearty entrees. A staple for affordable, flavorful meals.

name: The Hollow Bar + Kitchen
description: A trendy spot combining creative American dishes with a vibrant live music scene. Perfect for a night out with food and entertainment.

name: Villa Fresh Italian Kitchen
description: Known for its seafood pasta and Italian classics, this spot offers a taste of the ocean with a Mediterranean flair in a casual setting.

name: Thai Garden
description: A local favorite for authentic Thai cuisine, featuring spicy noodles, fragrant curries, and a welcoming atmosphere in the heart of Albany.

name: Lark Street Taco & Burrito Bar
description: A casual eatery on Lark Street specializing in customizable tacos and burritos. A go-to for quick, fresh, and flavorful Mexican bites.
